item.title: For the time being, try using FireBase Cloud Firestore with Python
item.description: ## Introduction “For the time being, I want to use Cloud Firestore of FireBase with Python!”, While following FireBase’s official document, write the basic procedure for “data input/output” I will. ##First… let’s create a “project” A “project” is a “collective” for using services such as Firestore, Cloud Functions, Authentication, and Hosting. Projects created with FireBase are also common with GCP. Now let’s create a project. First, go to FireBase Console.
